text: hi i'm angela noonam i graduated from
harvard business school in 1996.
i'm the founder and ceo of knockout
knockout is a line of high-tech
undergarments that literally tell
moisture and odour where to go using
natural cotton fabrics that people love
the amount of t-shirts the average man
has in cotton is something like 27 and
the amount of wicking synthetic shirts
is like four so the markets are huge out
there if you think about the
applications for cotton in undergarments
outerwear t-shirts jeans there's all
sorts of things i grew up in a textile
family and i saw the job losses that
we've had in textiles across the u.s and
when i had the opportunity to build a
textile company i was committed to
having those jobs here so all of our
products are made in america
